DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study assess impact sleep workshop sleep , mood , anxiety well-being measure sample college student . College student high prevalence sleep problem include poor sleep hygiene , volitional sleep deprivation , insomnia . Sleep disorder college student negatively affect mood , social functioning , physical safety , academic performance . Rarely recognized student , condition therefore often untreated . Participants study randomly assign receive College Sleep Improvement Plan ( C-SIP ) control session . Participants ask track sleep well complete questionnaire ; subset participant ask wear activity monitor .
DOC.criteria: Currently enrol class NYU Washington Square campus Students previously enrol `` While You Were Sleeping '' course NYU
